website_summaries.verdict: This economical hernia belt is designed to help you strengthen your abdominal muscles.
pros: Includes foam padding to apply ongoing pressure to a hernia
Latex-free belt offers a terrific option for individuals with sensitive skin
Boasts a non-abrasive fastening closure so you can wear the belt comfortably under your clothing
cons: Hook-and-loop tape can be difficult to adjust

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a 60-mile
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a 60-mile, 8-night trek in Kings Canyon National Park. That annoying little hernia likes to act up when I hike, or tense up the core for protracted periods. This was easy to adjust, and almost forgot I was wearing it. It is quick-dry material, and so was easy to rinse in the creeks along the way.
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Ing

customer_reviews.title: Good belt.  Problem velcro fastners are glued on.  They need to be sewn.
customer_reviews.text: Good umbilical hernia belt. It closes with velcro and has a pad that goes over the hernia that also attaches with velcro. The problem is the velcro is glued on and often comes apart. I like the design of the belt. It stretches easily for breathing has 2 vertical bars (the black bars) that are stiff to keep the belt from rolling up.
customer_reviews.author: Vantage

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's a little upsetting to think that because you're spending $30+ on something, it will be worthy. I received the belt on Monday and have been wearing it since. I got the XL side so there's enough room and I wouldn't have to stretch it. 3 DAYS after wearing it, the stitching has all busted, the Velcro is already coming off. This is very very upsetting to know I spent $30 on something that did not last me even a week. Now I will have to spend another $30 on another belt elsewhere because I really need it and that is not fair at all.

product_meta.title: OTC Hernia Belt, Abdominal Umbilical Treatment, Select Series, Large
product_meta.description:
Size:Large| Color:GreyOTC brand (model 2955) select series abdominal hernia support. Features a very simple design and very easy to use. It serves to be a comfortable support for a scrotal hernia in reduction, and can also be used in special situations after a hernia repair to prevent recurrence and offers excellent post-operative support. It is lightweight and comfortable to wear under clothing. 

 Use For: Umbilical hernia, weak or pendulous abdomen, abdominal contusions and tenderness
feature_bullets: For umbilical hernia, weak, pendulous abdomen, contusions and tenderness.
Ribbed webbed elastic molds around body contours for a comfortable, custom fit. Anti-microbial advanced technology fabric provides moisture management
